title: The Mystery at the Ski Jump
text:
The Mystery at the Ski Jump is the twenty-ninth volume in the <a href="Nancy%20Drew%20Mystery%20Stories">Nancy Drew Mystery Stories</a> series. It was first published in 1952 under the pseudonym <a href="Carolyn%20Keene">Carolyn Keene</a>. The actual author was ghostwriter <a href="Alma%20Sasse">Alma Sasse</a>.
Plot.
Nancy, Bess, and George follow the trail of fur thieves to New York and into Canada. While trying to catch the thieves, Nancy must catch a woman named Mitzi Channing who is using Nancy's identity. Nancy finds out that everyone who has been buying from Mitzi is in a dreadful trap.
